resources.string: Designed for smooth, natural vocal reproduction, ATM510 dynamic handheld microphone features a cardioid capsule that reduces pickup of sounds from the sides and rear, maximizing isolation from other sound sources and minimizing feedback. It is equipped with a rare-earth magnet for improved output and transient response, and has specially designed internal shock mounting for reduced handling and stage noise.

JBL have made their most powerful portable Bluetooth speaker even better. The iconic silhouette of the JBL Boombox 3 has a bold new update featuring a sturdy metal handle with silicone grips, twin sidecaps, and waterproof and dustproof signature fabric. It’s been redesigned inside too, added with a new subwoofer unleashing much deeper bass and massive JBL Original Pro Sound, all with lower distortion. And 24 hours of play time takes you all the way from your morning workout to a late-night hang with your friends. And for sound that’s practically limitless, instantly connect multiple speakers with the JBL Portable app.

Experience premium audio quality with Sennheiser Signature Sound, featuring a 42mm transducer system and aptX Adaptive for exceptional music playback. Customize your sound using the Sennheiser Smart Control App equalizer, presets, and sound modes. Stay immersed with Adaptive Noise Cancellation and Adjustable Transparency Mode, while enjoying up to 60 hours of battery life and fast charging. Designed for comfort, these lightweight, foldable headphones come with deeply cushioned ear pads and a padded headband. Enjoy crystal-clear calls with four digital beamforming microphones that reduce wind noise. Includes a carry case, USB-C charging cable, audio cables, and an airplane adapter.

Easily create music productions, livestreams, and podcasts on Mac, PC, iPad, and iPhone with versatile compatibility. Record vocals and instruments with rich, full sound using the Vintage Mic Preamp mode, and produce with top-tier software like Ableton, Melodyne, UJAM Virtual Drummer, Marshall, and Ampeg. Enjoy on-the-go recording powered by USB with class-leading 24-bit/192 kHz audio conversion. The device includes a studio-quality headphone amp, MIDI connections, 48V phantom power, and Direct Monitoring for latency-free recording.

The Shure SM7B is a cardioid dynamic microphone perfect for recording vocals and instruments. It features a smooth, flat, wide-range frequency response suitable for music and speech in all professional audio applications. The microphone air suspension shock isolation system eliminates mechanical noise transmission, while the internal "pop" filter eliminates the need for any add-on protection against explosive breath sounds.

Enjoy powerful sound with the Marshall Stanmore II Bluetooth Speaker, a versatile, home-friendly option that delivers clean and precise audio, even at the highest levels. Equipped with Bluetooth 5.0 and Qualcomm aptX technology, it allows wireless streaming from any Bluetooth device. The Stanmore II features classic Marshall design with its vintage front fret, iconic script logo, and brass control knobs.

The Bose QuietComfort Earbuds II provide breakthrough immersive sound and world-class noise cancellation. Personalize your listening experience with Bose CustomTune technology. These earbuds are sweat and weather-resistant and offer up to 6 hours of battery life per charge with an additional 12 hours via the charging case. Comes with a choice of ear tips and stability bands for a comfortable, secure fit.

The Focusrite Scarlett 2i2 is a best-selling USB audio interface designed for musicians, producers, and content creators. It provides two XLR/TRS combo inputs with preamps, 24-bit/192 kHz audio quality, and ultra-low latency for professional recording and monitoring. The Scarlett 2i2 is compatible with all major DAWs on both Mac and PC, and includes software such as Ableton Live Lite and Pro Tools First.

The Fender American Professional II Stratocaster is a versatile, high-performance electric guitar with a range of tonal options. Featuring a Deep "C" neck profile with rolled fingerboard edges, V-Mod II single-coil pickups, and a 2-point tremolo system for smooth bending and stability. This guitar is built for comfort, playability, and dynamic performance, suitable for a wide range of genres and styles.
Studio Monitors are back in stock!
Microphone: 20% off on all microphones until the end of the month!
Audio Interface: Buy one, get one 50% off!
